title: Brazilian Coffee Biscuits
ingredients: ['150g (5 oz) butter', '100g (4 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon semi-skimmed milk', '250g (9 oz) plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons instant coffee powder']
